meta.description: Design spec for user settings. This file is NOT imported at runtime. Actual settings are managed by NicknameEngine (@bu_nickname_config), AppContext (storage utility), and PrivacySecuritySettingsScreen.

fields.myNickname: How the user wants to be called
fields.partnerNickname: How their partner is called (synced to AppContext.partnerLabel on change)

bodyPositive.originalSpec: Include prompts that celebrate all body types and abilities
bodyPositive.reason: No prompts in prompts.json have a bodyPositive metadata tag. Needs content tagging before filter can work.

savePreferences.reason: All settings are always persisted. This toggle has no useful behavior.

anonymousUsage.originalSpec: Don't store any personal preference data
anonymousUsage.reason: App has no analytics/telemetry. No data sent externally. Would only prevent local preferences.
